@description.name: @description
@description.body: Low-level Range API which is used together with the low-level Selection API. This is especially useful whenever a developer want to work on text level, e.g. for an editor.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the range object of the given node.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: node {Node} node to get the range of
@param.description: node to get the range of
